title: Gaming Notebook vs Desktop - Is There A WINNER?
description: You can buy a gaming notebook as a desktop replacement but what are you giving up in terms of performance?  To see what you can buy off the shelf, we're using two identically priced & VERY similarly spec'd prebuilt gaming systems, the Legion T730 and Legion Y740 notebook.  And yes, we know you can build a custom PC for less but neither of these products is trying to compete with a custom PC.  :)  Buy these systems here:   Legion Y740 17":   Legion Y740 15":   Legion T730:    Subscribe    Review units were purchased by Hardware Canucks. This video is sponsored by Lenovo Legion and all expenses will be reimbursed by Legion's acting agent (we hope LOL!).   As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer despite this being a sponsored content piece.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.
